alpha.title: Tweeten Alpha 10
alpha.description:
Hi everyone,

Today we are releasing Build 10 to testers in the alpha update channel.

The update includes new improvements.

Here's what's new:

  • Lots and lots of bug fixes

beta.title: Tweeten Beta 2.0
beta.description:
Hi everyone,

Today, we are releasing Tweeten 2.0 for OS X with some new features and improvements.

With the latest update, the app can now display Tweet Actions (RT/Like buttons) all the time. Additionally, the update also lets you display a seperator for tweets, which will hopefully make reading tweets slightly easier.

We have also packed a bunch of small UI tweaks with this update. In additon to this, we have also improved font rendering, and the font shoud look slightly better with this update.

As usual, if you have any feedback, please let us know via Twitter (@tweetenapp). Happy Tweeting!

chrome.title: Tweeten Beta 1.9.3
chrome.description:
Hi everyone,

Today, we are releasing Tweeten 1.9.3 for Chrome. With the latest update, you can now show a seperator between tweets (kidna like the original TweetDeck).

As usual, if you have any feedback, please let us know via Twitter (@tweetenapp). Happy Tweeting!

edge.title: Tweeten Beta 1.8.2
edge.description:
Hi everyone,

Today, we are releasing Tweeten Beta 1.8.2 for Edge with a fix for TweetDeck's new improvements for the tweet actions. They have moved the tweet actions (like/rt buttons) to the left, and are now showing it by default. With 1.8.2, we've fixed the issue so that you don't see any weirdness on your timeline! You are welcome! :)

As usual, if you have any feedback, please let us know via Twitter (@tweetenapp). Happy Tweeting!
